mapper.insert: insert into lesson_group (id, name, grade_id, subject_id) VALUE (#{lessonGroup.id}, #{lessonGroup.name}, #{lessonGroup.gradeId}, #{lessonGroup.subjectId})
mapper.select: select g.id, g.name, g.subject_id, g.grade_id, g.version, u.id from lesson_group g left join group_user gu on g.id = gu.group_id left join user u on gu.user_id = u.id where group_leader_flag = 1 and g.id = #{id}
